newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Phonak sees 97/98 sales, profit up c.20pct.
newsitem.headline: Phonak sees 97/98 sales, profit up c.20pct.

text.p: Swiss hearing aid company Phonak Holding AG said it expected sales and profit to rise by around 20 percent in the 1997/98 business year ending on March 31.

"In the current year we again expect strong, primarily internal, sales growth of around 20 percent so that sales could top the 200 million Swiss franc level for the first time," it said. "Group profit should rise roughly in line with sales."
The company said 1996/97 profit will be steady around 17.5 million francs on sales of 171 million, up from 132 million.
